scripts.prepare: if [ ! -d "./lib/eufy-homey-client" ]; then git clone --branch feature/homey-integration https://github.com/martijnpoppen/eufy-security-client.git ./lib/eufy-homey-client && cd ./lib/eufy-homey-client && npm i --production && rm -rf ./src ./wireshark ./frida ./.vscode ./docs ./.github ./.git && cd ..; fi;
scripts.sync: rm -rf ./lib/eufy-homey-client && git clone --branch feature/homey-integration https://github.com/martijnpoppen/eufy-security-client.git ./lib/eufy-homey-client && cd ./lib/eufy-homey-client && npm i --production && rm -rf ./src ./wireshark ./frida ./.vscode ./docs ./.github ./.git && cd ..;
